text: Valentin Sergeyevich Pavlov (; 27 September 1937 - 30 March 2003) was a Soviet official who became a Russian banker following the dissolution of the Soviet Union. He was the Premier of the Soviet Union between January 1991 to August 1991. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Politicians from Moscow Category:Heads of government of the Soviet Union Category:Businesspeople from Moscow
title: Valentin Pavlov
